title: How to Make a Vodka Clam Digger Drink

steps.headline: Fill a cocktail mixer halfway with ice.
Pour the Clamato juice into the mixer.
Pour the vodka into the mixer.
Pour the Worcestershire sauce into the mixer.
Dump the lemon juice into the mixer.
Dump the hot sauce into the mixer.
Dump the salt into the mixer.
Dump the Greek seasoning into the mixer.
Strain and serve over ice into cocktail glasses.
Garnish with pepper and celery stalks.

text: Fill a cocktail mixer halfway with ice.  Pour the Clamato juice into the mixer.  Pour the vodka into the mixer.  Pour the Worcestershire sauce into the mixer.  Dump the lemon juice into the mixer.  Dump the hot sauce into the mixer.  Dump the salt into the mixer.  Dump the Greek seasoning into the mixer.  Shake vigorously.  Strain and serve over ice into cocktail glasses.  Garnish with pepper and celery stalks.
